attributes.action: not spend ten million pounds of tax payers money on the Diana & Dodi enquiry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In an already tax burdened society we feel it is deeply unfair that we have no say as to how our tax money is spent.
To spend ten million on asking AGAIN how a mortal being died, no matter how sad it may be, is outrageous.
We ask that our money be spent to benefit the living.
